name: TopoTrail
desc: Django, Vue.js, & Three.js project that parses GPS trail files and builds a 3D mesh with a trail overlay texture.
bullets: Allows users to view trails on real-world 3D terrain
Uploaded GEOJSON or GPX trail files generate a mesh and texture for the user
Gathers USGS satellite heightmap data and processes them through an algorithm to clean up anomalous datum
Users can rotate, zoom, and pan the 3D mesh in-browser
Each trail has privacy settings and the ability to upload photos and add comments

name: Hippos R Us
desc: Materialize CSS exercise to create a fictional company homepage.
bullets: Built to familiarize myself with the Materialize CSS framework
Uses custom icons in addition to those included with Materialize CSS
Hidden easter egg experiment with CSS keyframe animations - can you find it?

name: Ayyy Another To-Do List!
desc: Vue.js to-do list exercise using localStorage to save between sessions.
bullets: Vue.js Single Page Application - no refreshes needed
Uses your browser's localStorage to save items and their status, even if you close the page

name: Drink Decider 2000
desc: Vue.js exercise using Axios for API calls and experiment with accordion panel layout.
bullets: Vue.js Single Page Application - no refreshes needed
Uses API calls to populate data
Uses your browser's localStorage to save ingredients and reciples, even if you close the page

name: Mazegen
bullets: Generates a grid of user-selected size and carves a maze out of it
Accepts seed input to allow users to select a specific maze if desired
Can be reconfigured to allow output to other display method
